title: Miami Care Den
content:
Well, this isn't much to go on, but any help would be appreciated. It's a Bayer Sans/Chalet/Handel Gothic sort of font. Unfortunately, I cannot tell if that crossbar on the e sticks out on the left.   
   
 ![miami logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20051109094615im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/40452.jpg)
author: kristin

comments.content:
I'll give it a shot. Thanks, Tiffany!   
   
Alas, I shall not make it to TypeCon, though my colleagues Margery and Sachi are going. Please raise a glass for me and consider yourself virtually hugged. I will miss all my typophile friends!
